creator: Kauku
descriptionHtml:
The SCP Foundation is a fictional secret organization documented by the collaborative writing wiki project of the same name. Within the website's shared universe, the Foundation is responsible for capturing and containing various paranormal, supernatural, and other mysterious phenomena unexplained by mainstream science (known as "anomalies" or "SCPs"), while also keeping their existence hidden from the rest of human society.

Feature:
• A lot of reading lists (newbie friendly, list is updating...)
• SCP item with description and picture
• Supports multiple languages ​​(currently supports Chinese and English, updating...)
• Save articles to your Favorites
• Save articles to Read Later
• Keep track of which articles you've read


All content is licensed by the SCP Foundation under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 License. Fonts are obtained from https://fontlibrary.org/ and used under the SIL Open Font Licence
descriptionShort: A SCP FOUNDATION Reader, Secure, Contain, Protect.

title: Only SCP: A SCP READER

creator: Kauku
descriptionHtml:
Choose your favorite topic, read your favorite scp articles or add to the to-read list at any time.

Features.
1. Well-designed interface, organized reading list, easy to find the scp articles you want to read
2. Friendly reading interface, a variety of themes and font sizes to choose from
3. Concise title picture and summary
4. You can create favorites and to-read lists
5. Multi-language support is being updated (now supports Chinese and English)
6. You can share your favorite articles through pictures

The SCP Foundation is a fictional secret organization documented by the collaborative writing wiki project of the same name. Within the website's shared universe, the Foundation is responsible for capturing and containing various paranormal, supernatural, and other mysterious phenomena unexplained by mainstream science (known as "anomalies" or "SCPs"), while also keeping their existence hidden from the rest of human society.

All content is licensed by the SCP Foundation under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 License. Fonts are obtained from https://fontlibrary.org/ and used under the SIL Open Font Licence
descriptionShort: A clean and simple scp foundation reader, available for download now.
